# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $80 to me. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional item, I am proposing a price of $120. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive price. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
